this post critically examines the idea that individuals are responsible for protecting their personal information in the digital age. the author questions whether it is still possible to maintain privacy in today's world, where people share so much of their lives online. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations about data privacy.
